item.description:
Wake up and head to Northwest Park this morning for the annual Friends of Northwest Park Pancake Breakfast from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM in the Warming Shed.  Bring an appetite for a full breakfast of pancakes and sausage smothered in 100% pure maple syrup made right at Windsor’s very own Northwest Park.  Refreshment choices include orange juice, coffee, tea and hot chocolate.  $5.00 for adults and $3.00 for children under 6.

Directions to and information about the park can be found at www.northwestpark.org

We will meet at the Warming Shed (the first building you come to when you take the path from the parking lot) at 9:00.

After breakfast, check out the maple demonstration in the sugar shack, visit the animals, and for those who are interested a walk or hike can be arranged!
item.name: Pancake Breakfast
